channel.title: help please, problem starting gateway
channel.description:
i got whonix to start for first time yesterday
today i opened up VMM to do it again. i opened the gateway, tried to start it, and it said "error starting domain: network not found: no network with matching name "whonix-external"
i am using debian, the whonix gateway and workstation are listed under a vmm category called qemu/kvm

item.title: help please, problem starting gateway
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Open VMM → View → Connection Details → Virtual Networks and see if the whonix-external network is listed under there and running

Read full topic
